sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - நினை, எண்ணு, போசி, சிந்தி, விலக்கு, உண்டுபண்ணு. நினைத்திரு, யூகி, ஆலோசனைபண்ணு, மதியாமலிரு, விசித்திர வேலைகளைசெய், விநோத வேலைகளைச் செய், நிபுணரான தொழிலாளியாயிரு, தியானி, தள்ளு, சுமத்திரு, கணக்குப்பார், கணக்கிடு
to think, to plan, to esteem, to calculate, to invent, to make a judgment, to imagine, to count
3) to charge, to impute, to reckon
4) to esteem, to value, to regard
1) to be accounted, to be thought, to be esteemed
2) to be computed, to be reckoned
1) to think upon, consider, to be mindful of
2) to think to do, to devise, to plan

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to plait or interpenetrate, that is, (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute: - (make) account (of), conceive, consider, count, cunning (man, work, workman), devise, esteem, find out, forecast, hold, imagine, impute, invent, be like, mean, purpose, reckon (-ing be made), regard, think.
Cognate: H2803, H2805, H2806, H2807, H2808, H2809, H2810, H2811, H2812, H2813, H2815, H4284
